name: Pulp Institute of Art
description:
Play as Dog, a noble supporter of his owner, who's painting was stolen. You are on a quest to get it back and fight off anyone that stands in your way!

Space on the title screen to continue to the main menu, Z to confirm menu selections / flip pages in the story sections.

Thank you for playing.

Made some minor edits after the jam ended, changed an obnoxiously loud sound effect and fixed crash.

If you get sick of the action, you can press ' to skip an enemy.
